backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing tickets keyed by email with functions to submit forms, update completion, and modify categories.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking updated logo‑rendering feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing layout, components, styling, and query hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component composing the header, hero, tiers, contact form, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Contact form with validation, async submission to backend, success alert, and styled inputs.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, headline, CTAs, and scroll helpers for contact and service sections.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Service tier cards listing three pricing packages with features, styling, and CTA scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation shortcuts, and social links including smooth scrolling handlers.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a sticky responsive header with scroll detection, navigation buttons, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and triggers query invalidation when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context providing login, logout, identity loading, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a contact form submission mutation using the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, typography, and utility classes including logo styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, theme extensions, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, known issues, and image updates needed for the Blaine’s Card Clinic website, including broken logo paths and navigation issues. Serves as a fix request outlining features, assets, and architectural notes.
